'''1.14 Pre-Release 1''' is the first pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.14]], released on April 10, 2019,<ref name=1.14-pre1>{{Mcnet|minecraft-1-14-pre-release-1|Minecraft 1.14 Pre-Release 1|April 10, 2019}}</ref> which optimizes the game and fixes bugs. This is the first pre-release released in 2019.

== Changes ==
=== Mobs ===
'''[[Villager]]s'''
* Fletchers can no longer sell [[Luck]] arrows.

=== General ===
'''Optimizations'''
* Optimized gameplay.{{more info}}
* Inside the optimize world screen there is now an option to remove cached world data (e.g., height maps and light), so that it is re-computed when the world is next loaded.

'''[[Tags]]'''
* Removed all <code>poi</code> block tags, which were added in the previous snapshots.
